Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI sometimes will not analyse the problem, but the teacher does. Teacher will guid your and exam oriented.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI just provides words, but the teacher based on my response to gives me suggestions. I fell certainty of what I learn. However, teacher may feel sad and  annoying if student have many questions. Something student may not have the courage to ask the teacher.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI just provides words with many nouns that I may not know. The teacher will easily figure out which part I missed and then provide help.
